name: A square killing random squares in a square
name_original: A square killing random squares in a square
description:
WASD to move

QEZC to move diagonally

You can attack enemies by moving directly toward them from one space away or starting your move on a square next to them and then moving to another square next to them

Red enemies will attack you if you are next to them

Green enemies will attack you if you are within three spaces of them diagonally or orthogonally
